overview:
Neil has significant experience in highly regulated financial services businesses having started his career at Andersen, qualifying as a chartered accountant before becoming a senior manager in their financial services practice. Following time spent at Bear Stearns and Bank of America selling bonds and trading principal whole loans, he then joined HML, Europeâ€™s largest mortgage process outsourcer, as CFO and Deputy Chief Executive.

Neil was awarded Young Finance Director of the Year in 2009 and has also been shortlisted for many other CFO and industry awards. Neil also sat on the CBI Regional Board and is an acting board member of York, North Yorkshire and East Riding Local Enterprise Partnership.

Neil joined Nostrum in 2011 and performs both the CFO and COO role and is active in shaping our future strategy.
